individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to InfirmaryAmbushGuard04 in the room in the infirmary.loadlevel CRE_Main_Ateleport S_CRE_InfirmaryAmbushGuard04

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The provided input contains only one session (with an empty name) and doesn't show any indications or links to other sessions. Since ordering or exclusiveness constraints rely on relationships between multiple sessions, there is no ordering dependency or mutual exclusiveness to report.

0.speaker: Youth Pyrindath
0.text: If I'm seen speaking with an istik, Captain Therezzyn will never let me join the patrol.

1.speaker: Youth Pyrindath
1.text: So far not one patrol has found the device. But so far not one patrol has had me in it.

2.speaker: Youth Pyrindath
2.text: Leave me alone! I can't afford to be reported to the Captain.

3.speaker: Youth Pyrindath
3.text: I hope the kith'rak sends me to help find the artefact next.
